ygData.subject: Re: Gate to North?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think it s North Karana.  Have you ever seen those structures, 4 huge curving glowing pillars?  They re found in Toxullia Forest (near Erudin), at the
ygData.messageBody:
> On Eqlizer's site I noticed we get gate to North. I am
> wondering where is "North". I assume it is North Qeynos,
> but I would appreciate if someone can confirm this for me.

I think it's North Karana. Have you ever seen those structures, 4
huge curving glowing pillars? They're found in Toxullia Forest (near
Erudin), at the bridge in North Karanas, and in Greater Faydark.
Those are the places you can gate to with Fay Gate, North Gate and Tox
Gate.

Aznyin
Level 16 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
